definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.english: It works better if the blade's back edge (spine) somewhat touches the inner back edge of the scabbard while drawing out (same while inserting in).
sentences.chinese: 如果刀背略微贴着刀削的背部拔出会更好，插入亦然。

sentences.english: If this product blackening a bit, do not affect usage effect.
sentences.chinese: 本产品若略微变黑，不影响使用效果。

sentences.english: Position child with head of bed slightly elevated to decrease cerebral edema; monitor administration of fluids.
sentences.chinese: 卧床时，床头略微抬高，减少脑水肿，监视补液情况。

sentences.english: Wait a minute and I'll give my shoes a once-over.
sentences.chinese: 请稍等片刻，我把皮鞋略微擦一擦。

sentences.english: In 2010Q2, Avene was only slightly behind Lancome.
Now I'd like to make a slight change and redeploy the application.
sentences.chinese: 现在我想略微进行一些更改，然后重新部署应用程序。

sentences.english: The cost of climate protection would barely make a dent in that growth.
sentences.chinese: 气候保护的代价只会略微削弱收入的增长。

sentences.english: Slightly increased the upper limit for the Magic Boost stat.
sentences.chinese: 略微提高魔法增幅力上限值。

sentences.english: Slightly happy if you lower your levels of expectations, but not in the long term.
sentences.chinese: 降低期望水平会略微快乐些，但从长远来说行不通。

sentences.english: Keep the patient horizontal with the feet slightly raised.
sentences.chinese: 让病人保持平卧，双脚略微抬高。

sentences.english: The backs of their ears, head and legs are often tinged with a reddish color.
sentences.chinese: 在它们耳朵，眼睛和腿的后面往往混杂着略微的红色。

sentences.english: Fedor says she also tends to tilt her head a bit to the right in photos.
sentences.chinese: 费铎也说，她也在拍照时将头略微昂起。

sentences.english: Engine optimization that minorly improved performance.
sentences.chinese: 引擎优化，略微提升了性能。

sentences.english: Synonyms can have slightly different connotations.
sentences.chinese: 同义词之间的内涵意义会略微不同。

sentences.english: We want to ease off the defensive capabilities of Retribution and Holy paladins slightly.
sentences.chinese: 我们想略微降低一点惩戒与神圣圣骑士的防御能力。

sentences.english: This extra burden cuts fuel efficiency slightly.
sentences.chinese: 这个额外负担也会略微拉低燃料效率。

definition: to do with difficulty/to force sb to do sth/reluctant/barely enough
